## type [Options](<https://github.com/tfadeyi/sloth-simple-comments/blob/main/internal/parser/options/options.go#L11-L17>)

```go
type Options struct {
    Strategy      strategy.ParsingStrategy
    IncludedDirs  []string
    Logger        *logging.Logger
    SourceFile    string
    SourceContent io.ReadCloser
}
```
